Topic.Title: I'm back again, and I plan on staying this time.

Posts.EditableText: Hehehe - I don't confess to be the know-it-all of computers, but I call myself computer whizz...... obviously I'm good with comuters, and my claim is I can learn to operate most computers in a couple of hours - so I have a right to call myself computer whizz .
